channel.title: Rhino.UI.Gumball on Hugo based API Site
channel.description: Recent content in Rhino.UI.Gumball on Hugo based API Site

item.title: GumballAppearanceSettings
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Gumball public class GumballAppearanceSettings Constructors GumballAppearanceSettings() Properties int ArcThickness in pixels. int ArrowHeadLength in pixels. int ArrowHeadWidth in pixels. int AxisThickness in pixels. Color ColorMenuButton Color ColorX Default is Red. Color ColorY Default is Green. Color ColorZ Default is Blue. int FreeTranslate When FreeTranslate is 1, the center translation control can be dragged in any direction and moves the object the gumball controls. When FreeTranslate is 2, the center translation control can be dragged in any direction and moves the object the gumball itself.

item.title: GumballDisplayConduit
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Gumball public class GumballDisplayConduit : IDisposable Constructors GumballDisplayConduit() Properties GumballObject BaseGumball Starting location. bool Enabled GumballObject Gumball Transform GumballTransform The gumball transformation is the transformation calculated by comparing the current gumball to the starting BaseGumball. bool InRelocate GumballPickResult PickResult The inital mouse down event sets PickResult. Transform PreTransform The pre-transform is a transformation that needs to be applied before the gumball transformation. Transform TotalTransform The total transformation is GumballTransform * PreTransform.

item.title: GumballFrame
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Gumball Properties Plane Plane Vector3d ScaleGripDistance GumballScaleMode ScaleMode

item.title: GumballObject
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Gumball public class GumballObject : IDisposable Constructors GumballObject() Properties GumballFrame Frame Methods void Dispose() bool SetFromArc(Arc arc) bool SetFromBoundingBox(BoundingBox boundingBox) bool SetFromBoundingBox(Plane frame,BoundingBox frameBoundingBox) Sets the gumball bounding box with respect to a frame. Returns - True if input is valid and gumball is set. False if input is not valid. In this case, gumball is set to the default.

item.description: Namespace: Rhino.UI.Gumball public class GumballPickResult Properties GumballMode Mode Methods void SetToDefault()
